text: Sano ndema ja jwaujile Musa ku ŵandu ŵakwe juli jugasabiche ni kupwelembwesuka, jwatite: “Kaje kusakala yamwasigele nchitendaga panyuma pangu! Ana nkulumisye chilamusi cha M’mbuje gwenu (pakulitendela yenuyenupe nkaniyyimanye yatannamule)?” Ni jwaponyisye (pasi) maubawu, kaneka nijwakamwile ntwe wa nchimwenegwe ni kuuwutila kukwakwe. (Haruna) jwatite: “Mwanache jwa mama! Chisimu ŵandu ŵambweni ungali machili, mwanti ŵasigele panandi kuti ambulaje, basi nkaasengwachisya amagongo pa une (pakumba ipotesi), soni nkambika pamo ni ŵandu ŵakulitenda lupuso.”
